text: Big Wednesday is a 1978 American surfing drama movie. It was directed by John Milius. Actors include Jan-Michael Vincent, William Katt, Gary Busey, Lee Purcell, Patti D'Arbanville, Joe Spinell, Robert Englund, and Gerry Lopez. It was distributed by Warner Bros. ==Other websites== * * Category:1978 drama movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:American sports drama movies Category:Movies directed by John Milius Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:American coming-of-age movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1978 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies set on beaches
title: Big Wednesday
